feed.title: Google Cloud: Firestore with MongoDB compatibility
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Firestore with MongoDB compatibility

entry.content:
The Firestore databases page in the Google Cloud console now includes a status column. Possible statuses include:

  • Ready
  • Cloning is in progress
  • Restoring from backup is in progress
  • Deleted
  • Failed

For the cloning and restore statuses, the status column updates upon completion.
entry.summary: The Firestore databases page now displays a status column, showing states like Ready, Cloning in progress, Restoring from backup, Deleted, or Failed. This column updates in real-time for cloning and restore operations.
entry.title: Feature: New status column in Firestore

entry.summary: You can now use objects as document identifiers. This feature enhances flexibility for unique document identification.
entry.title: Feature: Object ID Support
